Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Ufficio Postale del Pubblico Ministero

This cramped room, no more than twelve feet by twelve feet in size, houses the official post office of the Crown. Windowless and fitted with a simple wrought iron chandelier hanging from the low copper tile ceiling overhead, the only other potential source of light in this space is provided by the pair of ebony double doors set in the western wall. A burgundy carpet runner, faded and worn from years of foot traffic, spans the short distance from the entryway to the counter stationed near the far wall. Behind the counter, most of the eastern wall is inset with small, yet deep, open-front boxes, many of which are filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.

This cramped room, no more than twelve feet by twelve feet in size, houses the official post office of the Crown. Windowless and fitted with a simple wrought iron chandelier hanging from the low copper tile ceiling overhead, the only other potential source of light in this space is provided by the pair of ebony double doors set in the western wall. A burgundy carpet runner, faded and worn from years of foot traffic, spans the short distance from the entryway to the counter stationed near the far wall. Behind the counter, most of the eastern wall is inset with small, yet deep, open-front boxes, many of which are filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.

This cramped room, no more than twelve feet by twelve feet in size, houses the official post office of the Crown. Windowless and fitted with a simple wrought iron chandelier hanging from the low copper tile ceiling overhead, the only other potential source of light in this space is provided by the pair of ebony double doors set in the western wall. A burgundy carpet runner, faded and worn from years of foot traffic, spans the short distance from the entryway to the counter stationed near the far wall. Behind the counter, most of the eastern wall is inset with small, yet deep, open-front boxes, many of which are filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.
a pair of ebony double doors leading west
A pair of double doors crafted from ebony leads to the west. $(parent-desc)
one of the mailboxes in the eastern wall

The entirety of the eastern wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.
the mailboxes in the eastern wall

The entirety of the eastern wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.
the low copper tile ceiling

The ceiling is fashioned from copper tiles, each embossed with a pair of curved branches, one olive and one oak. A simple wrought iron chandelier hangs from the center of the ceiling, its candlelight glittering across the intricate crests and troughs of the orange-toned metal.

The ceiling is fashioned from copper tiles, each embossed with a pair of curved branches, one olive and one oak. A simple wrought iron chandelier hangs from the center of the ceiling, its candlelight glittering across the intricate crests and troughs of the orange-toned metal.
simple wrought iron chandelier
A simple wrought iron chandelier bearing five arms hangs from the center of the low ceiling.
the basalt tile floor
The floor is crafted from dark basalt tiles of varying sizes laid in a basic geometric arrangement.
The floor is crafted from dark basalt tiles of varying sizes laid in a basic geometric arrangement.

The entirety of the western wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.

The entirety of the western wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.
No more than eight feet in height, the northern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling.
No more than eight feet in height, the northern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling.
No more than eight feet in height, the southern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling.
No more than eight feet in height, the southern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling.
No more than eight feet in height, the eastern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling. A pair of ebony double doors are set into the center of this wall.
No more than eight feet in height, the eastern wall features dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling. A pair of ebony double doors are set into the center of this wall.

No more than eight feet in height, the northern, western, and southern walls feature dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling. The entirety of the eastern wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.

No more than eight feet in height, the northern, western, and southern walls feature dark mahogany wainscoting from floor to ceiling. The entirety of the eastern wall is divided into deep, square compartments four inches by four inches in height and width. The boxes are open at the front, most filled with all manner of scrolls and parcels.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A \{ pair \| trio \| group \| handful \} of \{ men \| women \| people \} enter the building, each one squeezing into the small space to assemble in front of the counter to anxiously await their turn in the line. \| A young \{ girl \| boy \| child \} sprints into the shop and nearly bumps into you before running to the counter with a handful of scrolls eagerly outstretched. \| A tall husky man \{ frustratedly \| hurriedly \| frazzledly \| sighingly \} \{ sorts \| stacks \| organizes \| double-checks \} a large pile of \{ scrolls \| parchments \| envelopes \| cards \} before filing them away in their respective spots. \| A tall husky man \{ exhales \| sighs \| groans \| mutters to himself \} as a \{ man \| woman \| person \} drags a large satchel filled with scrolls into the room and plops it on the counter with a loud thump. \| A line begins to form at the counter as a large number of people begin queuing to receive their mail. One by one a tall husky man hands over scrolls, scraps and packages as the customers grow increasingly impatient. \| A \{ young \| well-dressed \| small \| middle-aged \} \{ man \| woman \} enters the space and steps to the counter, calling out for the attention of a tall husky man. \| People ebb and flow through the building with varying speed, the room becoming a constant flurry of activity as people go about their business. \| A tall husky man glances sideways at you, expectantly awaiting your needs. \| A tall husky man becomes distracted with a large stack of scrolls, appearing startled as he realizes you are still standing there. He stops what he is doing and stares for a moment before returning to the monumental stack of mail that needs tending. \| The air is tinged with the heady aromas of ink, paper and just an essence of the hundreds of bodies that come and go all day long. \| Dust flits through the stuffy air of the building, sloughed of the hundreds of scrolls that pass through the establishment on any given day. \| The building grows momentarily more crowded as people push and press to gain access to the mail room. A line forms out the door and frustrated calls and exclamations can be heard from outside. \| The press of bodies begins to fill the room as people jostle to get to the counter in the small, crowded space. \| A tall husky man briefly stops his flurry of activity to call for order as he struggles to keep up with the flow of customers that seem to continually enter and exit the space. \}

X[S] \{ A \{ pair \| trio \| group \| handful \} of \{ men \| women \| people \} enter the building, each one squeezing into the small space to assemble in front of the counter to anxiously await their turn in the line. \| A young \{ girl \| boy \| child \} sprints into the shop and nearly bumps into you before running to the counter with a handful of scrolls eagerly outstretched. \| A tall husky man \{ frustratedly \| hurriedly \| frazzledly \| sighingly \} \{ sorts \| stacks \| organizes \| double-checks \} a large pile of \{ scrolls \| parchments \| envelopes \| cards \} before filing them away in their respective spots. \| A tall husky man \{ exhales \| sighs \| groans \| mutters to himself \} as a \{ man \| woman \| person \} drags a large satchel filled with scrolls into the room and plops it on the counter with a loud thump. \| A line begins to form at the counter as a large number of people begin queuing to receive their mail. One by one a tall husky man hands over scrolls, scraps and packages as the customers grow increasingly impatient. \| A \{ young \| well-dressed \| small \| middle-aged \} \{ man \| woman \} enters the space and steps to the counter, calling out for the attention of a tall husky man. \| People ebb and flow through the building with varying speed, the room becoming a constant flurry of activity as people go about their business. \| A tall husky man glances sideways at you, expectantly awaiting your needs. \| A tall husky man becomes distracted with a large stack of scrolls, appearing startled as he realizes you are still standing there. He stops what he is doing and stares for a moment before returning to the monumental stack of mail that needs tending. \| The air is tinged with the heady aromas of ink, paper and just an essence of the hundreds of bodies that come and go all day long. \| Dust flits through the stuffy air of the building, sloughed of the hundreds of scrolls that pass through the establishment on any given day. \| The building grows momentarily more crowded as people push and press to gain access to the mail room. A line forms out the door and frustrated calls and exclamations can be heard from outside. \| The press of bodies begins to fill the room as people jostle to get to the counter in the small, crowded space. \| A tall husky man briefly stops his flurry of activity to call for order as he struggles to keep up with the flow of customers that seem to continually enter and exit the space. \}
